alert.note: Alert for Central Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued October 20 at 5:39PM AKDT until October 22 at 4:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM AKDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Central Beaufort Sea Coast including Prudhoe Bay. * WHEN...Until 4 PM AKDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Blowing and drifting snow will cause low visibility and make travel very difficult. Visibility may drop to near zero in whiteout conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds and worst conditions will be now through Saturday. Winds will gradually decrease Saturday night.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
